title: Fall In Love With Our Neighborhood! Nicest Floor Plans Await You!
posting_body: 111 North Rengstorff Avenue Mountain View, CA 94043
From stainless steel appliances to quartz or granite countertops, the features of this two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment at Madrone offer a mix of function and style to suit urban lifestyle needs.
In this modern home, the kitchen’s open-concept layout continues through the dining area and living room, emphasizing the spacious interior.
The outline of the master suite offers privacy and convenience with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom access.
Other notable features include Kaba or Latch keyless entry and a NEST thermostat.
Madrone provides a smoke-free, pet-friendly environment with a range of amenity options on the premises.
In the neighborhood, you’ll find a heated saltwater pool, barbecue grilling areas, and a garden space filled with citrus and herbs.
The neighborhood has a clubhouse and a fitness center as well.
Check the current pricing and availability of this home through the website or the leasing office.
